ques: She learned to _________ her own clothes to save money.
She likes to _________ through the forest and explore nature.
The colorful flowers in the garden _________ many butterflies.
Please do not _________ the sleeping baby.
Vaccinations can help _________ the spread of diseases.
The sudden rainstorm forced us to _________ our picnic plans.
It's important to _________ differences and embrace diversity.
The magician made the rabbit _________ from the hat.
They had a heated _________ over the decision.
The organization works to _________ a sense of community among its members.
Please remember to _________ the door when you leave.
The heavy box made the boat _________ lower in the water.
Family and friends _________ for a special celebration.
Can you _________ the details of the meeting last week?
Loud noises from the construction site can _________ the peace and quiet of the neighborhood.
The product was recalled due to a safety concern.
During the trip, they decided to _________ around the charming town.
They decided to _________ a rescue dog to provide it with a loving home.
His talent and charm have the ability to _________ a large audience.
The traffic accident caused a temporary _________ in the flow of vehicles.
The mysterious figure seemed to _________ into thin air.
A _________ of ducks swam gracefully in the pond.
After a long day, she just wanted to _________ into a comfortable chair.
He decided to _________ his laptop and take a break from work.
Wearing a seatbelt can _________ serious injuries in a car accident.
Students often _________ in the library to study together.
She couldn't _________ the constant noise from the construction site.
The tailor can expertly _________ custom suits.
The button came off, so she had to _________ it back on.
The team had to _________ together to complete the project on time.
The community came together to _________ donations for the local shelter.
Parents aim to _________ a love for reading in their children.
The anchor caused the ship to _________ to the ocean floor.
Security measures are in place to _________ unauthorized access to the building.
He would often _________ the streets of the city, taking in the sights.
I suddenly _________ a childhood memory of playing in the park.
Some people find it difficult to _________ spicy foods.
The unexpected news seemed to _________ her deeply.
Good marketing can help a business _________ more customers.
The footprints in the sand would soon _________ with the rising tide.
The company decided to _________ the production of the faulty product.
The strong winds made it difficult to _________ the window.
A technical issue can _________ the progress of a project.
A stone will _________ in water but not in oil.
In a _________ boat race, teamwork is essential.
Regular exercise and a healthy diet can _________ certain health conditions.
She wanted to _________ out the noise and distractions.
The lost hiker began to _________ deeper into the wilderness.
The teacher encourages students to _________ different viewpoints.
Mentors can help _________ the talents and skills of their mentees.
A sewing machine can make it easier to _________ fabrics.
The hope of finding the lost treasure began to _________.
The scent of freshly baked bread can _________ people to a bakery.
People _________ at the park to enjoy the outdoor concert.
The ongoing noise from the party began to _________ the neighbors.
It's important to _________ important information for future reference.
It's important to respect others' privacy and not _________ them.
Safety protocols are implemented to _________ accidents in the workplace.
The sun began to _________ below the horizon.
Her grandmother taught her how to _________ by hand.
The morning mist started to _________ as the sun rose.
A well-designed website can _________ visitors and keep them engaged.
The school strives to _________ a positive and inclusive learning environment.
The siblings often got into _________s over trivial matters.
It's important to _________ off lights to save energy.
He could no longer _________ the rude behavior of his coworker.
Their conversation would sometimes _________ to various topics.
The witness struggled to _________ the events accurately.
It's a tradition to _________ around the table for holiday meals.
The commander ordered a _________ to the advancing troops.
